Lyrics: Pose un gran foco nel mio petto Amore.
Poetic Translation: A fire was set by Love inside my being.

Lyrics: Che m'arse un tempo il cor con viva forza;
Poetic Translation: My heart was once aflame with great desire.

Lyrics: Ma sdegno giusto ogni gran foco ammorza.
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: But righteous scorn can quench the greatest fire.

Lyrics: Fu l'ardor grave ch'ogni dì cresceva,
Poetic Translation: It grew each day, my grievous passion freeing,

Lyrics: Or non mi scalda più, non mi rinforza;
Poetic Translation: But warms no more; no more can it inspire.

Lyrics: Che sdegno giusto ogni gran foco ammorza.
Poetic Translation: For righteous scorn can quench the greatest fire.
